attributes.action: Assign us certain days, cause can't get another job, can't achieve off a job.
attributes.additional_details: Reason being we are not on enough hours to be able to save up to buy a house and achieve other milestones. All of our money goes on the cost of living like travelling to work, lunch money, and prescriptions etc.
attributes.background:
Stop setting us up to fail!

Retail career issues

Either give us more CONTRACTED hours at work or give us ASSIGNED DAYS that STAY THE SAME in order to look for another job. I have worked in retail for nearly three years and have noticed this is happening in every shop.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

Acas's advice is for every worker and employer across England, Scotland and Wales:
